definitions.definition: to push something firmly, often without causing it to move permanently further away from you:
examples: Press the button to start the machine.

definitions.definition: to make clothes smooth by ironing them:
to put a weight on fruit in order to remove the juice:
to make a CD, DVD, etc.:
examples: Over 3,000 copies of the CD were pressed and sent out to college radio stations.

definitions.definition: to make something flat and firm by putting it under something heavy:
